content: my jeannie baby cardigan hat and blanket are very popular so i thought i would add a pretty little bonnet too 0 - 3 months and 3 - 6 months requires dk yarn ~ around 18g of acrylic dk 4mm needles a small button if desired there are 2 options for fastening the bonnet - a chin strap or crochet tie / ribbon so sweet **to get this free pattern please click on the https link just below ↓**
